column4: can anyone tell me where I can send a complain about ubuntu 8.10? I just want to know why they decided to take out screens and graphics out of 8.10. My resolution can go up to 1280 x 1024 in 8.04 but in 8.10 I can only go up to 800x 600. PLEASE DO NOT TELL ME TO GO TO SCREEN SETTINGS IT DOESN"T WORK. THanks!
actually, ironically, I had this issue with 8.04, booting in live was ok, and not after install, did you see that?
